name: Starship Stowaway .67
description:
Version .67 Day 2

gave the Saucer some basic lasers.. a long range laser and a short range one.. fired by the mouse buttons... work in progress. .

Version .67 Day 1... 

just a "playground" of bits I took from previous version.. a couple planetoids, with little guys on them.. a small planet.. and a test enemy..thats all..

..Starship Stowaway, been working on it about a year now.. interesting story.. guy comes up to me, talks for a bit, TL/DR he's a migrant, and came over here via umping on board 31 different ships.... I listened to his story, and when he was finished he said "you should make a game about that!".. so I am..  

here's a video from last Summer... before I got into the game jams.. when this and VEE were my only projects.. so I'm going back to it, updating it with everything I've learned over the last few months.
